text: ELAYNA (voiceover): Riley hadn't seen much of NZ since he arrived

airport to meet up with a guy named JP
would take us to see a bit of New Zealand by plane
So we're just sitting in the
aero club waiting for JP to land

which everyone knows that's a no-no

You can't say spin in plane , what would you say

in Africa in South West Africa had a pretty

and went from there basically

this.

So I've got a question for the girls out there this afternoon
I was just wondering if you
would jump in a plane with someone you
had just met and go flying because that's what I did
and only thought about it afterwards and
I think it was a little bit silly, I'm glad that I did it,

it was fun but -
